name: Fruit Frenzy
description:
[ About Game ]

It's a simple game in which player has to separate the fruits and put them into their respective box. But there is timer continuously running and Player has to sort as many fruits as he/she can within the time. Now there is also another condition that if player puts wrong fruit into the basket. The Time will be reduced by 5 seconds. Similarly, If the player puts correct fruit into the basket, the time will increase by 1 second.

Also each fruits has a specific points :-

1. Apple = 5 POINTS

2. Banana = 10 POINTS

3. Strawberry = 15 POINTS

The Highest score will be stored into the game.

[  Few words ]

I am currently pursing Bachelor in Computer Applications and I have keen interest in game development. I am currently learning Unity.

I made this game as a challenge for myself because , I have not any prior experience with GDevelop game engine  also, this is my first game jam ever. On Feb 1st I downloaded it first time and this is what I have made in 3 days.

Hope you like it.
